basics.name: Alejandro Gómez
basics.label: Software Engineer focused on making good UIs
basics.summary: Highly motivated Software Engineer with 20 years of experience building full-stack web applications, specializing in front-end development.  A proactive and accountable team player passionate about collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.  Eager to tackle industry challenges and create impactful web products.

work.name: Aspire Systems
work.summary: Helping Aspire Systems to provide Software Consultancy services to their customers. I adapt to every specific client and project according to their necessities, mostly based on custom tailored React Apps. My duties here are to solve tech challenges, either designing a new component, proposing new user interfaces, improving their current testing coverage, or adding features from the backlog

work.name: Freelancing
work.summary: Providing software development services to small companies or individuals through market places such as Upwork, focusing on React and Vue technologies.

work.name: Freestar
work.summary: Worked as a Front End developer to maintain and bring new features to their Main Dashboard, used for their internal operations. Made the next generation of their Public Dashboard that contained rich data reports and a better user interface that could help publishers administer their ads inventory
highlights: Built the next generation of their Public Dashboard

work.name: Spot2Nite
work.summary: Worked with their internal API to maintain and bring new features. Integrated recreation.gov API to their reservations search engine. Built their first Public Reservations Web App
highlights: Created their first Reservation Web App
Integrated a public National Parks API to their search engine

work.name: Convert
work.summary: Worked and grew along with the company for 5 years, contributing to their Web App evolution over that period. Built 3 generations of their User Interface, on every upgrade adding and pivoting features according to the market needs. Contributed to reach the company's 100K MRR goal by implementing the UI features the product needed at the time. Contributed to enforce GDPR compliance in the App ecosystem. Introducing coding standards and best practices to the team. Helped to build the first draft of the development culture of the company
highlights: Built the second generation of convert SPA
Built the third generation of convert SPA

work.name: Method Exists
work.summary: Collaborated to develop a data-rich application that had to be capable of delivering vast amounts of data to be displayed and edited in real time using web sockets. We had to build Web Forms that contained several complex fields per page

work.name: Convert
work.summary: Built the first generation of Convert's Single Page Application as an external consultant. This UI revamp introduced a fresh style and a more responsive experience to their customers

work.name: Wontonmedia
work.summary: Built a CMS that was sold as a product to manage photo and video galleries for content network in the adult industry

work.name: DTraveller
work.summary: Being responsible for keeping DTraveller's e-commerce applications up to date and running. Built integrations with local payment gateways services for the e-commerce solutions.

projects.name: Paisania
projects.description: A platform that connects travelers with small communities across Spain. We advocate for a mindful travel experience that fosters genuine connections with people and respects the places we visit

projects.name: The Broker
projects.description: A a lightweight UI to display data from the Marketstack API. You can use it with your own Marketstack API keys to view general data on your web browser. Give the project a star if you like it.
